Definition at line 47 of file Op_Conv_AmontNew_VEF_Face.cpp.

{
  int amont;
  double flux;

  if (psc >= 0)
    {
      amont = num1;
      if(comp==0)
        fluent[num2] += psc;
    }
  else
    {
      amont = num2;
      if(comp==0)
        fluent[num1] -= psc;
    }

  if(amont==num1)
    flux = T1*psc;
  else
    flux = T2*psc;
  if(ncomp>1)
    {
      resu(num1,comp) -= flux;
      resu(num2,comp) += flux;
    }
  else
    {
      resu(num1) -= flux;
      resu(num2) += flux;
    }
}
